titleStmt.title: An account of the proceedings in the House of Commons in relation to the recoining the clipp'd money, and falling the price of guineas together with a particular list of the names of the members consenting and dissenting : in answer to a letter out of the countrey.
titleStmt.author: Wagstaffe, Thomas, 1645-1712.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Wagstaffe. Cf. BM.
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Published also in: A collection of scarce and valuable papers. London, 1712.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
